title: ICE with inline-const in match referencing const-generic parameter

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: F-inline_const
labels.description: Inline constants (aka: const blocks, const expressions, anonymous constants)

body:
I tried this code: ```rust #![feature(inline_const)] fn foo() { match 0 { const { V } => {}, _ => {}, } } ``` ``` error: internal compiler error: /rustc/a8486b64b0c87dabd045453b6c81500015d122d6/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/consts.rs:193:32: expected bits of usize, got Const { ty: usize, val: Param( V/#0, ), } thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/a8486b64b0c87dabd045453b6c81500015d122d6/library/std/src/panic.rs:59:5 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.52.0-nightly (a8486b64b 2021-02-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [mir_built] building MIR for `foo` #1 [unsafety_check_result] unsafety-checking `foo` end of query stack error: aborting due to previous error; 1 warning emitted error: could not compile `playground` ``` ### Meta
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/a8486b64b0c87dabd045453b6c81500015d122d6/library/std/src/panic.rs:59:5 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: std::panic::panic_any 2: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 3: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 5: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 7: indexmap::map::core::Entry::or_insert_with 8: rustc_mir_build::build::matches::::match_simplified_candidates 9: rustc_mir_build::build::matches::::match_candidates::{{closure}} 10: rustc_mir_build::build::matches::::lower_match_tree 11: rustc_mir_build::build::expr::into::::into_expr 12: rustc_mir_build::build::scope::::in_scope 13: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 14: rustc_mir_build::build::expr::into::::into_expr 15: rustc_mir_build::build::block::::ast_block_stmts 16: rustc_mir_build::build::expr::into::::into_expr 17: rustc_mir_build::build::scope::::in_scope 18: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 19: rustc_mir_build::build::expr::into::::into_expr 20: rustc_mir_build::build::scope::::in_scope 21: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 22: rustc_mir_build::build::expr::into::::into_expr 23: rustc_mir_build::build::construct_fn 24: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 25: rustc_mir_build::build::mir_built 26: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 27: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 28: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 29: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 30: ::mir_built 31: rustc_mir::transform::check_unsafety::unsafety_check_result 32: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 33: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 34: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 35: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 36: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 37: ::unsafety_check_result 38: rustc_mir::transform::mir_const 39: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 40: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 41: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 42: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 43: ::mir_const 44: rustc_mir::transform::mir_promoted 45: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 46: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 47: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 48: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 49: ::mir_promoted 50: rustc_mir::borrow_check::mir_borrowck 51: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 52: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 53: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 54: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 55: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 56: ::mir_borrowck 57: rustc_middle::ty::::par_body_owners 58: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 59: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 60: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 61: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::force_query_with_job 62: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 63: ::analysis 64: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 65: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 66: rustc_span::with_source_map 67: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 68: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
